name: Timberbrook's Bandit Menace
description:
For weeks, travelers to Timberbrook have gone missing. Merchants whisper of masked raiders ambushing supply carts and dragging victims into the woods. Just yesterday, a bloodied draft horse returned alone. The town’s food stores are dwindling.
Track the raiders’ movements, infiltrate their forest camp, and eliminate their leader to restore safe passage and stability to the region.

name: Eldhollow's Glowing Ruins
description:
In the dead of night, villagers near Eldhollow report strange lights flickering in the ruins north of town. Some say they hear voices calling from underground halls that should’ve collapsed long ago. The mayor fears ancient wards may have failed.
Travel to the ruins, investigate the disturbance, and report your findings to the local magistrate.

name: Merchant's Foxbeast Gauntlet
description:
A spice merchant returning from the southern dunes seeks protection through foxbeast territory near Ventus’ outskirts. The creatures have grown bold, attacking caravans in broad daylight.
Escort the merchant safely to the city gates and fend off any ambushes along the way.

name: Westcliff's Stolen Ledger
description:
Thieves broke into the Westcliff magistrate’s office and escaped with the city’s tax ledger—one containing the names of high-profile debts and land transfers.
Follow the trail through narrow gullies and market alleys, recover the stolen book, and return it before its contents are sold to the highest bidder.

name: Southfield's Ravaging Boar
description:
Fields outside Southfield lie in ruin. A massive, tusked boar has been tearing through farmland, scattering livestock and crushing fencing with reckless fury. Farmers refuse to work until it’s dealt with.
Locate the beast, bring it down, and help restore peace to the harvest lands.

name: Acolyte's Foggy Trail
description:
A young acolyte must reach the chapel across the fog-shrouded Whisperpine Trail to complete her initiation. The forest path has become treacherous in recent weeks, with rumors of cloaked figures moving beneath the mist.
Escort her safely to the chapel and ensure no harm befalls her on the sacred journey.

name: Mapping Forgotten Stream
description:
The cartographer’s records show only blank parchment near the southern stream bend. Locals claim the area has shifted after heavy rains, revealing hidden forks and submerged hazards.
Navigate the wild terrain, chart the updated stream layout, and mark any dangers for future travelers.

name: Blacksmith's Lost Tools
description:
A blacksmith traveling between towns dropped his tools while fleeing a sudden wolf pack attack. He returned shaken and weaponless.
Head to the Hollowford trail, locate the scattered tools, and retrieve them before they’re lost or stolen.

name: Burning Spider Nest
description:
Woodcutters north of Ventus have abandoned their camps after encountering a nest of venomous tree spiders. The creatures have woven thick webs across logging paths and shelters.
Locate the nest, ignite the core, and burn out the infestation to make the woods safe again.

name: Healer's Plague Mission
description:
A rare illness has spread across the outpost of Ashvale. The local healer requires an escort to reach the patients with her curatives intact. Bandits have been spotted nearby, and panic is rising.
Shield the healer during travel, defend her from roadside threats, and guide her safely to Ashvale so she can tend to the sick without delay.

name: Riverpath Ambushers
description:
Merchant caravans and lone travelers have gone missing near the river crossing west of Ventus. Survivors speak of shadowy figures striking from behind rocks and reeds, vanishing with coin and cargo.
Scout the crossing, lure the ambushers into the open, and eliminate them to ensure safe passage resumes.

name: Stonemason's Ravine Blueprints
description:
While surveying terrain near Hollowford, a stonemason fled a sudden wolf attack and lost his blueprint scrolls in a ravine. The plans detail an upcoming trade bridge critical to Ventus’ western route.
Descend the ravine, recover the scrolls intact, and return them before rival guilds intervene.

name: Caves' Echoes
description:
Miners at Lorn Hollow reported unnatural echoes and halted operations after tools were thrown and lights extinguished without cause.
Enter the caves, chart their interior paths, and determine whether these disturbances come from structural shifts—or something deeper.

name: Scribe's Bandit Road
description:
A guild scribe bearing sealed records for Greenharbor must travel along a stretch of road plagued by bandit sightings.
Guide the scribe through dangerous crossings, shield him during moments of ambush, and defend the package until it reaches the receiving clerk.

name: Northwatch Wolf Hunt
description:
Wolves have descended from the frostline hills and begun attacking livestock and shepherds outside Northwatch.
Track their prints through snow and brush, locate the den, and bring down the pack before it grows bolder.

name: Elde river's Lost Crate
description:
A merchant’s supply crate was lost in a recent bridge collapse at Northbridge. The waters have receded, but scavengers now stalk the banks.
Search the river, retrieve the crate before looters reach it, and return it to its rightful owner.

name: Gravefield's Smoke Mystery
description:
Dense black smoke has begun to rise from the bogs in Gravefield, alarming nearby trappers. With no known campfires or settlements in that area, the Guild fears unnatural sources.
Navigate the shifting wetlands, investigate the origin of the smoke, and report your findings before it spreads further.

name: Guildhall Rat Purge
description:
The storage cellars beneath Ventus Guildhall have become overrun with aggressive rats, likely driven upward by flooding tunnels. They’ve begun tearing into provisions and damaging sealed scrolls.
Descend into the cellar, clear out the infestation, and reseal the vulnerable entrances.

name: Herbalist's Thistleway Escort
description:
An apprentice herbalist seeks rare herbs in the brushlands beyond Thistleway Trail. She has knowledge but lacks defense skills.
Escort her through overgrown terrain, shield her from wild beasts, and guide her back with a full satchel of gathered flora.

name: Ventus' Sunken Tunnels
description:
Tools and debris have vanished into the waterlogged tunnels beneath Ventus. Rumors suggest entire pathways have collapsed, revealing hidden chambers and flows.
Enter the tunnels, chart submerged routes, and determine whether these changes are natural or engineered.

name: Ridgewood's Hyenabeast Blockade
description:
Trade between Ridgewood and Ventus has halted due to a pack of hyenabeasts that have claimed the canyon pass. Their howls echo day and night, and scouts have gone missing.
Track the creatures through rocky terrain, bait them from their lair, and eliminate the pack to reopen the trade route.

name: Abandoned Mill Mystery
description:
Strange creaking and whispers have been reported from the long-abandoned mill east of Ventus. Locals refuse to go near it after dusk.
Approach the structure, investigate the source of the disturbances, and report your findings to the Guild registry.

name: Grain Caravan's Thorncat Threat
description:
A grain caravan en route to Ventus must pass through thickets where thorncats have recently been spotted. These agile predators are known for swift ambushes.
Escort the wagons, defend the caravan master, and guide them safely through to the city gates.

name: Marsh Prowler Hunt
description:
Villagers near Dunmarch speak of a low growl in the reeds and missing livestock come morning. The culprit is a marsh prowler—a reclusive but lethal predator.
Track its movements at dawn and dusk, flush it from its lair, and slay it before it claims another victim.

name: Slide Valley Salvage
description:
After a courier wagon veered off the road into Slide Valley, sealed mailbags were scattered among the rubble. The slope is unstable, and local scavengers have already begun combing the wreck.
Descend into the valley, locate the official parcels, and recover them before they’re tampered with.

name: Artisan's Fair Escort
description:
A traveling artisan must reach Ashcroft in time for the midsummer fair to present her wares. The road, however, is filled with opportunists targeting festival merchants.
Shield her from danger, guide her through backroads if needed, and ensure she arrives safely with her goods intact.

name: Healer's Moss Retrieval
description:
Glowing Rockmoss, a vital alchemical reagent, grows in the moist caves near Ashvale. A Ventus healer has requested a fresh batch for her remedies.
Enter the cavern network, harvest the moss under low light, and return it quickly before it loses potency.

name: Emberdell's Banner Escort
description:
The ceremonial banner for Emberdell’s yearly festival must arrive undamaged. Bandits know its value, and mishandling would dishonor the event.
Escort the courier, defend the relic during travel, and ensure it is unfurled with pride before the town square.

name: Collapsed Quarry Assessment
description:
Following a recent collapse, the quarry foreman has requested a neutral party to examine the damage and determine safety conditions.
Traverse unstable slopes, evaluate structural integrity, and prepare a report for the Guild’s reconstruction team.

name: Timbewood Mill Saboteurs
description:
Bronzewood’s grain supply is under threat. The mill’s mechanisms have been sabotaged twice in one moon.
Investigate local tensions, track those responsible, and eliminate the saboteurs before the region faces famine.

name: Envoy to Castle Embrance
description:
A political envoy bearing treaty documents must reach Castle Embrance across contested lands.
Escort him with discretion, shield him from opportunists, and ensure no party tampers with the message or his arrival.

name: Stonecoil's Lost Sunstone
description:
A miner lost a rare sunstone while fleeing serpents inside Stonecoil Den. The gem fell deep within a winding, venomous nest.
Brave the caverns, recover the intact sunstone, and return it before rival hands seize it.

name: Salt Flats' Unnatural Movement
description:
Salt caravans have noted unusual tremors and shifting paths through the Salt Flats. Strange fissures glow at night.
Survey the region thoroughly, chart new safe routes, and determine whether these movements are magical in nature.

name: Observatory Ruins Expedition
description:
A collapsed observatory near Ashcroft may still house ancient sky-charts. A royal scholar has requested safe passage to the site.
Escort her across unstable terrain, defend her during excavation, and return with whatever knowledge survives.

name: Embervault's Stolen Charter
description:
The Guild's original charter was sold under duress by a desperate scribe. Now it lies within the possession of an Embervault trader who refuses to negotiate.
Travel to the Embervault markets, recover the document by any means necessary, and return it to Guild custody.

name: Thornvale's Shifting Paths
description:
Following a quake, Thornvale's terrain has shifted dramatically, rendering maps obsolete.
Travel through the unstable valley, chart safe new routes, and record hazards so future caravans won’t be caught off guard.

name: Prisoner to Southbridge
description:
A high-profile prisoner must be escorted from Ventus to Southbridge for trial. Many wish to silence him en route.
Shield him from bounty hunters, guide the convoy through alternative paths, and ensure he stands trial alive.

name: Blackfen's Alpha Serpent
description:
Water traffic through Blackfen has ceased due to a monstrous alpha serpent nesting in the reeds. Locate its lair by following drag trails and boat wreckage.
Engage and eliminate the beast to reopen the waterways.

name: Stolen Archive Scrolls
description:
A courier was ambushed on the highway, losing sensitive archive scrolls meant for preservation.
Track the thieves through roadside camps, recover the scrolls intact, and return them before their contents are copied or sold.

name: Ashen Ridge Faultline
description:
Tremors near Ashen Ridge have exposed a glowing faultline. Rumors speak of elemental interference.
Investigate the breach site, document any anomalies, and report whether the ridge is safe to inhabit.

name: Broken Hold Raiders
description:
The Broken Hold, a ruined outpost once abandoned, has become a raider stronghold.
Approach with caution, assess their defenses, and purge the area to reclaim it for Guild use.

name: Emberdell's Lost Taxes
description:
Emberdell’s tax records were lost during a river crossing when a guard was thrown from the ferry.
Recover the sealed ledgers from the riverbank or nearby villages before they fall into criminal hands.

name: Goldwater Falls Caverns
description:
Strange lights have been spotted behind Goldwater Falls. Locals fear a haunting, but miners suspect hidden crystals.
Enter the caverns, investigate the source, and determine if it's natural or arcane.

name: Frostvine Berry Escort
description:
A brewer seeks rare frostvine berries found deep within the frostwoods.
Escort him through predator-infested trails, shield him from danger, and guide him safely to the berry groves and back before dusk frost sets in.

name: Moonveil's Howling Pack
description:
Supply carts traveling the Moonveil stretch have been attacked by a pack of organized howlers.
Survey the route at dusk, draw out the pack, and eliminate the threat before further trade disruptions occur.

name: Church's Forgotten Relic
description:
An ancient silver relic was left behind in a deconsecrated church now overrun by scavengers.
Enter the crumbling sanctuary, locate the relic, and return it to the clergy before it’s sold to collectors.

name: Eastern Bluffs Survey
description:
Guild geologists require updated assessments of the Eastern Bluffs after recent landslides.
Scale the cliffs, take hazard readings, and record structural weaknesses to prevent future collapses.

name: Merchant Row Smugglers
description:
Smugglers have turned the old tunnels beneath Merchant Row into a covert hideout.
Infiltrate the underground network, identify key figures, and dismantle their operations before their next shipment moves.

name: Stolen Mining Documents
description:
Prospecting records critical to mining operations were stolen from the Ventus office.
Track the culprits to their hideout, retrieve the documents without damage, and return them before rival guilds capitalize on the loss.

name: Stormglen's Hidden Basin
description:
A hunter claims to have discovered an uncharted basin in Stormglen, rich with rare flora.
Verify the location, sketch detailed maps, and assess whether the basin should be protected or harvested.

name: Twin Caravans to Hearthpost
description:
Two allied caravans must reach Hearthpost together, but recent threats demand a coordinated escort.
Guide both caravans across multiple checkpoints, defend against ambushes, and ensure no stragglers are lost en route.

name: Snakefang Gang Takedown
description:
The Snakefang gang has resurfaced in Dunmarch and fortified their position.
Launch a preemptive strike, breach their stronghold, and dismantle the gang before their influence spreads.

name: Gravefield's Oathblade
description:
An ancient Oathblade, a symbol of peace, has been stolen from its resting place in Gravefield. Raiders may attempt to wield it as a rallying symbol.
Track the thieves across the badlands, recover the relic, and ensure it is returned to hallowed ground.

name: Windswept Range Mapping
description:
Powerful winds have shifted snowcaps and exposed new routes in the Windswept Range.
Climb these treacherous paths, chart new passes, and log potential hazards before future expeditions attempt the crossing.

name: Bard's Cragspire Journey
description:
A bard claiming to know ancient melodies lost to time is bound for Cragspire.
Escort him through rough country, defend him from bandits drawn to his lavish gear, and ensure he delivers his songs to the archive.

name: Burnt Hollow's Wyrmspawn
description:
Reports of scorched livestock and twisted trees point to a wyrmspawn clutch emerging in Burnt Hollow.
Track the hatchlings’ trail, eliminate them before they mature, and destroy the nest if it remains intact.

name: Starlight Compass Retrieval
description:
The last functioning starlight compass, an invaluable navigational tool, lies deep within a sealed ruin.
Navigate old warding traps, locate the device, and retrieve it without damaging its delicate mechanism.

name: Magistrate's Southbridge Escort
description:
The magistrate must reach a summit in Southbridge to preside over a critical hearing. The route is plagued by known ambushers.
Guard her carriage, anticipate threats, and ensure her arrival without political delay.

name: Flintspire Chasm Depths
description:
No one has returned from the lowest levels of Flintspire Chasm. Strange lights and rumbling sounds continue to emerge.
Descend the chasm with caution, explore the depths, and return with whatever truths are buried below.

name: Stoneway's Basilisk Hunt
description:
Livestock have turned to stone outside Stoneway. A basilisk is on the prowl.
Track the beast by its trail of petrified remnants, engage it without meeting its gaze, and slay it before it reaches populated areas.

name: Stonevale's Banner Recovery
description:
Stonevale’s war banner was captured during a recent skirmish. The enemy now flaunts it at their camp’s entrance.
Infiltrate the site, retrieve the banner, and return it before morale in Stonevale breaks.

name: Goldenhold's Archive Delivery
description:
A sacred archive must be delivered to Goldenhold for sealing in their Grand Vault. Bandits and relic hunters are aware of its route.
Shield the convoy, repel any attacks, and ensure the scrolls reach the archivist untouched.

name: Blightscar Expanse Survey
description:
The earth east of Ventus has begun to rot unnaturally. The blight spreads daily, devouring soil and stunting growth.
Survey the area’s edge, chart its advance, and report whether magical interference is to blame.

name: Southwatch Outpost Siege
description:
Enemy scouts have surrounded the Southwatch Outpost. Supplies are running low, and the garrison cannot hold.
Lead a strike force, disrupt the attackers’ formation, and provide a path for reinforcements to arrive.

name: Firevault's Ancient Map
description:
Deep within the burning vaults of Embervault lies a historic map said to lead to forgotten ruins.
Brave the blistering heat, bypass collapsed passages, and retrieve the artifact intact.

name: High Council's Urgent Report
description:
A sealed report must reach the High Council before nightfall, bypassing all known patrols.
Travel by shadow, evade detection, and deliver the message directly to the Speaker’s hand.

name: Derathal's Whispering Mines
description:
Voices echo from the long-closed mines of Derathal—too clearly for wind.
Descend into the dark, document any signs of life or arcane residue, and determine if the mine should remain sealed or cleansed.

name: Greenglade's Forest Maw
description:
Hunters speak of a carnivorous bloom devouring creatures whole in Greenglade.
Track the vines back to their source, destroy the Forest Maw, and ensure no spore remains to spread.

name: Sealed Book Retrieval
description:
A sealed tome containing noble bloodline secrets has gone missing.
Track its last known holder, retrieve it quietly, and return it without drawing attention to its existence.

name: Frostwatch Avalanche Aid
description:
Frostwatch lies buried under an avalanche.
Escort the medics and their supply sleds across unstable snowfields, defend them from wolves and exposure, and help establish a temporary field post.

name: Shattered Altar
description:
A sacred altar near Brimwell Abby has cracked open, leaking waves of heat.
Investigate the cause, determine whether a fire elemental breach is underway, and seal the site if necessary.

name: Quarry Barrens Gang
description:
A vicious gang has overtaken the quarry barrens, halting stone delivery for rebuilding efforts.
Infiltrate the area, dismantle their leadership, and secure the quarry so workers can return safely.

name: Vaultcrack's Lost Ledgers
description:
During a tremor, vital records of land ownership and debt fell into the depths of the Vaultcrack fissure.
Navigate the unstable descent, retrieve the sealed ledgers, and return before shifting stone seals off the lower chamber.

name: Summit Lighthouse Delivery
description:
An alchemical lens critical to Summit Hill’s lighthouse has been delayed. Without it, the coast will remain blind at nightfall.
Escort the shipment through narrow cliff paths, defend it from opportunists, and install it if necessary.

name: Lorn Hollow Caves
description:
The caves near Lorn Hollow are expanding at an unnatural rate, threatening nearby farmland.
Explore the tunnels, map their growth, and assess whether a magical source is accelerating the spread.

name: War-Torn Escort
description:
A noble and their entourage must cross through a war-torn region to reach a diplomatic summit.
Shield them from crossfire, guide the group along safer woodland trails, and ensure their survival above all else.

name: Suncaller's Deadly Threat
description:
A powerful creature awakened by ancient rites threatens several frontier settlements.
Assemble a strike team, track its lair through scorched earth, and eliminate the threat with no quarter given.

name: Red Knight's Forbidden Zone
description:
The Forbidden Zone, once sealed by the Red Knight Order, now pulses with arcane signatures.
Chart the terrain, document anomalies, and return with insight before the zone expands further.

name: Frostmaw's Perilous Escort
description:
Guide a high-value envoy through Frostmaw Pass—now overrun with territorial beastfolk.
Travel discreetly, defend during skirmishes, and ensure no diplomatic secrets are lost if the mission fails.

name: Veilwatcher's Silent Elimination
description:
A marked target hides in fortified enemy territory. Infiltrate quietly, bypass all alarms, and eliminate the target without alerting surrounding forces.
No survivors, no sound.

name: Starblade's Guarded Journey
description:
The bearer of the Starblade, a living artifact, must reach the capital before the solstice.
Escort him through contested lands, repel all interference, and ensure blade and bearer remain united.

name: Enemy Ruins Artifact
description:
An irreplaceable artifact lies hidden within enemy-occupied ruins.
Infiltrate their excavation, bypass arcane wards, and extract the relic before it is defiled or destroyed.

name: Frostmaw's Forbidden Exploration
description:
A section of the forbidden Frostmaw region is thawing, revealing ruins and buried magic.
Chart the terrain while avoiding the lingering ice spirits, collect any recoverable artifacts, and return before the fog seals the path again.

name: Blood Hunter's Escort
description:
A Blood Hunter on assignment carries knowledge too dangerous to fall into enemy hands.
Escort him through hostile terrain, defend him without drawing attention, and guarantee that neither the mission nor the man is compromised.

name: Blood Hunter's Elimination
description:
The Blood Hunter now targets a legendary beast threatening border patrols.
Join him, assist in flushing the beast from hiding, and ensure its utter destruction—no corpse, no return.

name: Crimson Thicket Watch
description:
Travelers crossing the Crimson Thicket have vanished without a trace. The foliage has grown unusually thick, muffling sound and swallowing light.
Enter the overgrown path, investigate the disappearances, and uncover what stalks beneath the brush.

name: Ashvale Apothecary's Burden
description:
An elderly apothecary carrying experimental cures must reach the Ashvale hospice before the outbreak worsens.
Escort her through uneven mountain passes, protect her from local wildlife, and keep the satchels unshaken.

name: Shadowroot Assassination
description:
The Guild has marked a traitor meeting with foreign agents beneath the Shadowroot Canopy.
Infiltrate the meeting unseen, confirm the target, and execute the sentence with precision—no witnesses, no survivors.

name: Brimwell's Shattered Reliquary
description:
A tremor has cracked open the old reliquary beneath Brimwell Abbey, scattering holy relics among debris and spirits.
Recover what remains, pacify any restless souls, and reseal the chamber before more awaken.

name: Hollowpine Smuggler Route
description:
A recently unearthed tunnel beneath Hollowpine appears to be an active smuggler’s route.
Map the tunnel system, disable any hidden traps or signal markers, and determine whether it links to larger operations.

name: Beacon of the Southwatch
description:
The beacon atop Southwatch has gone dark for the first time in decades. A lone flamekeeper was stationed there.
Ascend the mountain trail, uncover what befell the tower, and reignite the signal—no matter what you find.

name: Riftcaller's Final Rite
description:
A Riftcaller has requested a guard detail for her final rite—sealing a breach in reality near Stormglen.
Escort her to the rupture site, defend the ceremony from extraplanar threats, and ensure the ritual concludes.

name: Westcliff Ambush Reprisal
description:
A trade envoy was slain en route to Westcliff. The killers left no survivors.
Track the attackers through wind-stripped plains, identify their hideout, and make an example that will echo beyond the borders.

name: Whisperglass Courier Recovery
description:
A courier transporting Whisperglass shards—a component of secure communications—has vanished. The last signal came from near the Cloudbreak Plateau.
Locate the wreck, recover the shards, and ensure no transmissions were intercepted.

name: Embervault's Emberwolf Pack
description:
A pack of emberwolves has descended from the volcanic ridges, attacking cattle and torching sheds.
Follow their trails of scorched earth, engage the alpha, and eliminate the threat before they reach the town proper.
